learning_objective: Compare and refine multiple algorithms for the same task and determine which is the most appropriate.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has decided to start a wellness program that focuses on both their mental and physical health. They are developing an algorithm to monitor their daily activities. They used two algorithms (algorithm A and algorithm B). Algorithm A tracks the time spent on physical activities such as working out, walking, etc., while algorithm B tracks meditating, reading, and other mental wellness activities.What aspect of the algorithms should Alex refine to get a more complete image of their overall wellness?",
    "Answer1": "Alex should refine algorithm A to track mental wellness activities",
    "Answer2": "Alex should refine algorithm B to track physical health activities",
    "Answer3": "Alex should combine both algorithms to track both mental and physical wellness activities",
    "Answer4": "Both algorithms are adequate",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "To get a complete overview of their overall wellness, Alex needs to track both physical and mental wellness activities. Combining both algorithms A and B will provide Alex with the needed information.",
    "code_snippet": "class Wellness 
    integer physicalActivitiesTime 
    integer mentalActivitiesTime 
 
    action PhysicalActivity(integer time) 
        physicalActivitiesTime = physicalActivitiesTime + time 
    end 
 
    action MentalActivity(integer time) 
        mentalActivitiesTime = mentalActivitiesTime + time 
    end 
end"
}
